sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Task Force on Infant and Maternal Mortality Among African Americans Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Task Force on Infant and Maternal Mortality Among African Americans Act.

sections.heading: Findings. Based upon an April 11, 2018 New York Times article on "Why America's Black Mothers and Babies Are in a Life-or-Death Crisis", the General Assembly finds the following:
sections.text: Findings. Based upon an April 11, 2018 New York Times article on "Why America's Black Mothers and Babies Are in a Life-or-Death Crisis", the General Assembly finds the following:

sections.heading: Task Force on Infant and Maternal Mortality Among African Americans.
sections.text: Task Force on Infant and Maternal Mortality Among African Americans.

sections.heading: Report. Beginning December 1, 2020, and for each year thereafter, the Task Force shall submit a report of its findings and recommendations to the General Assembly
sections.text: The report to the General Assembly shall be filed with the Clerk of the House of Representatives and the Secretary of the Senate in elec

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
